<row gap="medium">

---

When you invest this [_clear quartz crystal ball_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=253), it orbits your head like an [_aeon stone_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=407). As long as you have the _stargazer_ invested, you can use an Interact action to direct it to orbit one of your hands where you can telekinetically smash the orb into foes, wielding it as a _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [returning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=301) [club](/Weapons.aspx?ID=2)_. While you're directing the _stargazer_, your hand is full, and you can send it back to your head with another Interact action. On a critical hit, the _stargazer_ pulses with hypnotic starlight, [dazzling](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) the struck creature for 1 round. A stargazer doesn't add [critical specialization effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=235).
